headline.main: ACTION COMPLETED ON 42 BILLION BILL; Senate and House Send the Gigantic War Measure to the White House FUNDS FOR 100,000 TANKS Thomas Predicts Improvements Will Result From German Advance in Egypt

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 30 -- By two unanimous votes the Senate and House today completed legislative action on the $42,820,003,067 War Department Appropriation Bill for the fiscal year beginning tomorrow and thus sent the largest appropriation measure in the nation's history to the White House.
abstract: Fund included in appropriations bill passed by House

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
